name: Sqube Darkness
description:
RUN!

Go as far as you can through challenging obstacles and take your place on the top.

Hide from the watching eyes, go over the fire pits. Run over platforms that are rebuilt every time. This game is a great endless running game with a black and white atmosphere like you've never seen before. The excitement of not getting caught leaves a taste that you have never experienced in a game before.

Every new day, you will strive to rise to the top of the leaderboard and you will want to be the best of that year.

ONLINE RACE

When you get bored of playing alone, you will be able to compete with your friends and take the excitement to the next level.

SQUBE BIRD!

Try other game modes to collect cube points.

You should definitely try this game that is not complicated, does not tire the eyes, is relaxing, completely original.
